title: The ultimate matric exam study buddy
text:
Ace your exams – get the help you need with expert assistance at the best price

Preparing for matric exams? Cue Study Guru, your answer to exam preparation. Get the ultimate handy helper and access expert pre-recorded tutorial assistance that give peace of mind to students and parents alike.

It’s never too late to invest in yourself and your future, so here’s to acing your matric exams and kick-starting your prospects with Study Guru.

Access the core matric subjects with helpful tutorials created by specially selected teachers with up to 50 years’ experience – plus they’ve set a multitude of national senior certificate exams! You can’t just place your education in anyone’s hands and that little extra assistance can make a major difference.

Make the most of this unique and revolutionary platform during the build-up to the end of your high school career.

Study Guru aims to provide the youth of South Africa with access to great teachers and top-quality learning materials.

Why you’ll love Study Guru
description: Ace your exams – get the help you need with expert assistance at the best price
